meanings.sent1: The young athlete was considered draftable by many professional teams.
meanings.sent2: The college players hoped to be draftable in the upcoming sports draft.
meanings.sent3: The draftable player's friends joked that he might get picked last.
meanings.sent4: Her skills made her as draftable as a top recruit in the draft.
meanings.sent5: Being draftable meant a chance for a new exciting opportunity.

meanings.definition: Suitable for selection in a draft
meanings.sent1: The team captain chose the most draftable players for the match.
meanings.sent2: The scout identified the draftable prospects for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The draftable candidates were excited to showcase their abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her performance made her as draftable as the top pick in the draft.
meanings.sent5: The draftable options were carefully considered before making a decision.

meanings.sent1: All young men of draftable age were required to register for the draft.
meanings.sent2: The draftable recruits underwent training before deployment.
meanings.sent3: The draftable soldiers were proud to serve their country.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to duty made him as draftable as any soldier.
meanings.sent5: Being draftable meant being ready to defend the nation when called upon.
